add-edit-vehicle.color-help: Can be the color of the car or just a color you like to differentiate it from the others.
add-edit-vehicle.name: Name
add-edit-vehicle.name-help: The brand, or the model, or just how you usually call it.

create-vehicle.subtitle: Doesn't matter if its a car, a motorcycle, a truck or whatever. If it can be parked, it can be forgotten where.
create-vehicle.title: Add a new vehicle

first-start.desc: Never again circle your whole neighbourhood looking for your car!
first-start.first-step: To start, let's create our first vehicle.
first-start.title: Welcome to Paircel!

history.empty: No records of any parking yet.

park.confirm-msg: Do you want to park in the selected spot?

settings.footer: Developed with the intention of never having to send yourself the location again!

vehicle-list.subtitle: Click on your vehicle to see its parking history.
